* Optimized shop UI, the page is more concise and beautiful!

Brand-new feature PVP system released! Check the details as follows:
* Added PVP global ranking, you will get rich rewards based on the ranking after season competition end.
* Character appearance can be customized! Wearing equipment will change the appearance and strengthen attributes!
* You can name the character and view detailed battle statistics!
* Added new skills other than Eagle-eyed!
* Added rune system, equipt runes to improve your power!
* Increased the level limit of weapon parts upgrade!

Update game now, and compete with players all over the world!
